creator: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com

comments.text:
Created attachment 8983628
Screen Shot 2018-06-05 at 8.32.14 PM.png

Seen while running Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.14; rv:61.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/61.0. Running on 10.14 Beta.

See attached screenshot. Both Nightly and Firefox beta show multiple instances of "Insert From" in the Edit menu. Not sure what the trigger is. Restarting the Firefox browser often temporarily clears the multiple instances.
comments.author: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com

comments.text: Marcia, can you check if this is a recent regression? I know 10.14 is new but knowing when this was introduced may help us fix it.
comments.author: jaws@mozilla.com

comments.text: :spohl, any chance you know what's up here? It doesn't look like this is a menu entry the frontend inserts, more like it's coming from platform/macOS.
comments.author: gijskruitbosch+bugs@gmail.com

comments.text: I am trying to research where this menu entry is coming from. I did install Tableau Public on the machine, and I am wondering if it possibly came from there.
comments.author: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com

comments.text: I'm able to reproduce on a fresh install of 10.14. Every time that I switch to a different application and back to Firefox I get one additional "Insert From" menu entry.
comments.author: spohl.mozilla.bugs@gmail.com

comments.text: This sounds awfully similar to bug 764696, which was fixed by Apple in 10.8 before it was released. Marcia, do you mind filing a bug with Apple?
comments.author: spohl.mozilla.bugs@gmail.com

comments.text: I am able to reproduce this on macOS 10.14 and Firefox Developer Edition by changing focus to any other window, including other Firefox windows. It doesn't appear to happen in other applications (at least as far as I know).
comments.author: michaelmatyi@icloud.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Stephen A Pohl [:spohl] from comment #5)
> This sounds awfully similar to bug 764696, which was fixed by Apple in 10.8
> before it was released. Marcia, do you mind filing a bug with Apple?

Yes, I will file a bug with Apple now.
comments.author: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Marcia Knous [:marcia - needinfo? me] from comment #7)
> (In reply to Stephen A Pohl [:spohl] from comment #5)
> > This sounds awfully similar to bug 764696, which was fixed by Apple in 10.8
> > before it was released. Marcia, do you mind filing a bug with Apple?
> 
> Yes, I will file a bug with Apple now.

Filed issue 41004913 on the Apple Bug Reporter.
comments.author: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

summary: [10.14] "Insert From" shows multiple times in the Edit Menu

changes.removed: "Insert From" shows multiple times in the Edit Menu
changes.added: [10.14] "Insert From" shows multiple times in the Edit Menu
